body.p: Alarms are indicated on the local WaveStar Infinity Monitor or network-connected browser. The central header panel turns red if alarms are present or orange if only warnings are present. If there are no alarm or warning conditions the central header panel is green.
Active alarms are listed on the Active Alarms screen and alarms are retained on the Latched Alarms screen until reset and on the Log screen until reset.

fig.title: WaveStar Infinity Monitoring: Alarm and Log Screens

body.p: Alarms for each device can be read from WaveStar Infinityâ€™s consolidated Modbus points list or consolidated SNMP MIB.
A relay can also be setup to send a dry contact Summary Alarm.
For detailed information, see WaveStar Infinity Monitoring System, Setup and Operation P-164001106.
